column4: is there some simple way to get workspace switcher to show the previews in 10.10? i know the feature was there automatically in previous ubuntus, but it isnt enabled and i'm not seein option?
are you talking about the thing in the menu bar?
right click> add to panel> (bottom of list) workspace switcher
add that to the panel and right click> Move if it isnt in the right spot and right click> lock to pannel if you want it to not move
